## Domain
Which domain does this example cover?

## Self-Audit Checklist
- [ ] All 5 CORE sections present and compliant
- [ ] FAILED conditions with measurable thresholds and timeouts
- [ ] All assumptions have VALIDATE BY + IMPACT IF WRONG
- [ ] All phase gates are binary and observable
- [ ] Grade matches rubric criteria (C/B/A only, no +/-)
- [ ] Self-audit passes all 21 anti-patterns honestly (no "mostly")
- [ ] Domain-specific required sections present
- [ ] Reference Library included (if coding domain with 3+ phases)
- [ ] Review Checkpoints in phases (if coding domain)
- [ ] End State paragraph present (if targeting Grade A)
- [ ] Resume Protocol present (if >10h effort)

What grade does this example aim for? [ C / B / A ]
